name: Gentle Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover
about: What it is: A transforming oil cleanser that melts away waterproof makeup and other impurities, leaving the skin soft, moisturized and feeling hydrated...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Uneven Texture, Oiliness..Formulation: Lightweight Gel..Highlighted Ingredients:.Korean Herbal Oil Complex: Helps melt oil-based purities while softening and nourishing skin.Hydra Capture Complex: Helps skin retain moisture even after cleansing..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, and sulfates SLS & SLES...What Else You Need to Know: Infused with a Korean Herbal Oil Complex, this powerful oil cleanser cleanses skin of pore clogging impurities without leaving any residue. With a unique, lightweight texture that transforms upon contact with water, it melts away sunscreen, waterproof makeup, and excess sebum...Clinical Results: After 2 weeks of use:.93% agreed this product thoroughly cleanses makeup residue on the skin* 93% agreed their skin feels moiszurized after cleansing* 93% agreed their skin feels soft after cleansing* *Based on a 2-week independent consumer study on 30 women 30-45....Allure
ingredients: -Hydra Capture Complex: Contains four herbal ingredients that help skin stay hydrated..-Mulberry Leaf and Mountain Yam Extracts: Soften and cleanse skin...Glycinate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Acrylates/Beheneth-25 Methacrylate Copolymer, PEG-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate, Sodium Chloride, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Fragrance/Parfum, Isostearic Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Butylene Glycol, Limonene, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Coix Lacryma-Jobi Ma-Yuen Seed Extract, Citrus Unshiu Peel Extract, Castanea Crenata (Chestnut) Shell Extract, Linalool, Spirodela Polyrhiza Extract, Dioscorea Japonica Root Extract, Dextrin, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Salicornia Herbacea Extract, Morus Alba Leaf Extract, Angelica Keiskei Extract, Citric Acid, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Massage two pumps onto dry skin, gliding fingertips over the nose, forehead, cheeks, and chin until makeup and oil are dissolved. Emulsify with lukewarm water and rinse until clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first ever cleansing oil so I donu2019t know much but I absolutely love the way it cleanses. It does the job for pores and it smells so good!
